<soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:ws="http://ws.api.meveo.org/"> <soapenv:Header/> <soapenv:Body> <ws:createOrUpdateMeasurableQuantity>
<measurableQuantity code="${#Project#baseEntityPrefix}_MQ1" description="${#Project#baseEntityPrefix}_MQ1-DESC">
<dimension1>1</dimension1>
<dimension2>2</dimension2>
<dimension3>3</dimension3>
<dimension4>4</dimension4> <editable>false</editable> <additive>true</additive>
<sqlQuery>select count(*) from billing_subscription where status='CREATED' and date(created)='#{date}' and provider_id=#{provider}</sqlQuery>
<measurementPeriod>MONTHLY</measurementPeriod>
<lastMeasureDate>2016-03-16</lastMeasureDate> </measurableQuantity> </ws:createOrUpdateMeasurableQuantity> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>

con:request.name: create ScriptInstance
con:request.con:request:
<soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:ws="http://ws.api.meveo.org/">\r
   <soapenv:Header/>\r
   <soapenv:Body>\r
      <ws:createOrUpdate>
         	<createOrUpdateScriptInstanceRequest code="org.meveo.service.script.${#Project#baseEntityPrefix}_Script" description="${#Project#baseEntityPrefix}_Script_Instance">
            <type>JAVA</type>
            <script>
            <![CDATA[
			package org.meveo.service.script;			
			import java.util.Map;
			import java.math.BigDecimal;
			import org.meveo.admin.exception.BusinessException;
			import org.meveo.model.admin.User;
			import org.meveo.model.crm.Provider;
			import org.slf4j.Logger;
			import org.slf4j.LoggerFactory;			
			public class ${#Project#baseEntityPrefix}_Script extends Script {			  
			  	private static final Logger log = LoggerFactory.getLogger(${#Project#baseEntityPrefix}_Script.class);
				public void execute(Map<String,Object> context, User user) throws BusinessException{
					log.debug("${#Project#baseEntityPrefix}_Script creation script...");
					log.debug("${#Project#baseEntityPrefix}_Script creation script.");
				}
			}
		   ]]>
            </script>
            <executionRoles name="administrateur"></executionRoles>
            <sourcingRoles name="administrateur"> </sourcingRoles>            
         </createOrUpdateScriptInstanceRequest>
      </ws:createOrUpdate>\r
   </soapenv:Body>\r
</soapenv:Envelope>

Payer acc. Custommer false true SELECT wo.amount_without_tax/((EXTRACT(epoch FROM (wo.end_date - wo.start_date))/86400)) as mrr_value, wo.offer_code as offer_code,ba.code as ba_code,ca.code as ca_code,cust.code as cust_code FROM billing_wallet_operation wo LEFT JOIN crm_provider p ON p.id=wo.provider_id LEFT JOIN billing_charge_instance ci ON ci.id=wo.charge_instance_id LEFT JOIN billing_subscription sub ON sub.id = ci.subscription_id LEFT JOIN billing_wallet w ON w.id=wo.wallet_id LEFT JOIN billing_user_account uaa ON uaa.id= w.user_account_id LEFT JOIN account_entity ua ON ua.id= uaa.id LEFT JOIN billing_billing_account baa ON baa.id= uaa.billing_account_id LEFT JOIN account_entity ba ON ba.id= baa.id LEFT JOIN ar_customer_account caa ON caa.id= baa.customer_account_id LEFT JOIN account_entity ca ON ca.id= caa.id LEFT JOIN crm_customer custa ON custa.id= caa.customer_id LEFT JOIN account_entity cust ON cust.id= custa.id WHERE wo.disabled=FALSE AND wo.provider_id=#{provider} AND NOT(wo.end_date IS NULL) AND ((EXTRACT(epoch FROM (wo.end_date - wo.start_date))/86400))>0 AND (wo.start_date <= '#{date}') AND (wo.end_date > '#{date}') DAILY 2016-02-21T20:00:00-03:00 1400px 100px true 8 10 false false Date Monthly Rec. Revenue 30 0 0 true false true first second false false select now from dual

wo.start_date))/86400)) as mrr_value, wo.offer_code as offer_code,ba.code as ba_code,ca.code as ca_code,cust.code as cust_code FROM billing_wallet_operation wo LEFT JOIN crm_provider p ON p.id=wo.provider_id LEFT JOIN billing_charge_instance ci ON ci.id=wo.charge_instance_id LEFT JOIN billing_subscription sub ON sub.id = ci.subscription_id LEFT JOIN billing_wallet w ON w.id=wo.wallet_id LEFT JOIN billing_user_account uaa ON uaa.id= w.user_account_id LEFT JOIN account_entity ua ON ua.id= uaa.id LEFT JOIN billing_billing_account baa ON baa.id= uaa.billing_account_id LEFT JOIN account_entity ba ON ba.id= baa.id LEFT JOIN ar_customer_account caa ON caa.id= baa.customer_account_id LEFT JOIN account_entity ca ON ca.id= caa.id LEFT JOIN crm_customer custa ON custa.id= caa.customer_id LEFT JOIN account_entity cust ON cust.id= custa.id WHERE wo.disabled=FALSE AND wo.provider_id=#{provider} AND NOT(wo.end_date IS NULL) AND ((EXTRACT(epoch FROM (wo.end_date - wo.start_date))/86400))>0 AND (wo.start_date <= '#{date}') AND (wo.end_date > '#{date}')</sqlQuery>\r <measurementPeriod>DAILY</measurementPeriod>\r <lastMeasureDate>2016-02-21T20:00:00-03:00</lastMeasureDate>\r </measurableQuantity>\r <width>1400px</width>\r <height>100px</height>\r <style>width:1000px</style>\r <visible>true</visible>\r <barPadding>8</barPadding>\r <barMargin>10</barMargin>\r <stacked>false</stacked>\r <breakOnNull>false</breakOnNull>\r <xaxisLabel>Date</xaxisLabel>\r <yaxisLabel>Monthly Rec. Revenue</yaxisLabel>\r <xaxisAngle>30</xaxisAngle>\r <legendCols>0</legendCols>\r <legendRows>0</legendRows>\r <zoom>true</zoom>\r <animate>false</animate>\r <showDataTip>true</showDataTip>\r </barChart>\r </moduleItems>\r </subModule>\r <measurableQuantity code="${#Project#entityPrefix}_${#TestSuite#index}_BOM_Measure1">\r <dimension1>first</dimension1>\r <dimension2>second</dimension2>\r <editable>false</editable>\r <additive>false</additive>\r <sqlQuery>select now from dual</sqlQuery>\r </measurableQuantity>\r </moduleItems>\r </businessOfferModel>\r </ws:createBusinessOfferModel>\r </soapenv:Body>\r </soapenv:Envelope>

wo.start_date))/86400)) as mrr_value, wo.offer_code as offer_code,ba.code as ba_code,ca.code as ca_code,cust.code as cust_code FROM billing_wallet_operation wo LEFT JOIN crm_provider p ON p.id=wo.provider_id LEFT JOIN billing_charge_instance ci ON ci.id=wo.charge_instance_id LEFT JOIN billing_subscription sub ON sub.id = ci.subscription_id LEFT JOIN billing_wallet w ON w.id=wo.wallet_id LEFT JOIN billing_user_account uaa ON uaa.id= w.user_account_id LEFT JOIN account_entity ua ON ua.id= uaa.id LEFT JOIN billing_billing_account baa ON baa.id= uaa.billing_account_id LEFT JOIN account_entity ba ON ba.id= baa.id LEFT JOIN ar_customer_account caa ON caa.id= baa.customer_account_id LEFT JOIN account_entity ca ON ca.id= caa.id LEFT JOIN crm_customer custa ON custa.id= caa.customer_id LEFT JOIN account_entity cust ON cust.id= custa.id WHERE wo.disabled=FALSE AND wo.provider_id=#{provider} AND NOT(wo.end_date IS NULL) AND ((EXTRACT(epoch FROM (wo.end_date - wo.start_date))/86400))>0 AND (wo.start_date <= '#{date}') AND (wo.end_date > '#{date}')</sqlQuery> <measurementPeriod>DAILY</measurementPeriod> <lastMeasureDate>2016-02-21T20:00:00-03:00</lastMeasureDate> </measurableQuantity> <width>1400px</width> <height>100px</height> <style>width:1000px</style> <visible>true</visible> <barPadding>8</barPadding> <barMargin>10</barMargin> <stacked>false</stacked> <breakOnNull>false</breakOnNull> <xaxisLabel>Date</xaxisLabel> <yaxisLabel>Monthly Rec. <classNameFilter>org.meveo.model.billing.BillingAccount</classNameFilter>\r <eventTypeFilter>REJECTED</eventTypeFilter>\r <scriptParams/>\r <host>i.meveo.info</host>\r <port>443</port>\r <page>meveo/api/rest</page>\r <httpMethod>HTTP_POST</httpMethod>\r <headers/>\r <params/>\r </webhookNotif>\r <measurableQuantity code="${#Project#entityPrefix}_${#TestSuite#index}_Measure_Chart">\r <dimension1>Three</dimension1>\r <dimension2>Four</dimension2>\r <editable>false</editable>\r <additive>false</additive>\r </measurableQuantity>\r <barChart code="${#Project#entityPrefix}_${#TestSuite#index}_chart" description="Chart">\r <measurableQuantity code="${#Project#entityPrefix}_${#TestSuite#index}_Measure_Chart">\r <dimension1>Offer</dimension1>\r <dimension2>Billing acc.</dimension2>\r <dimension3>Payer acc.</dimension3>\r <dimension4>Custommer</dimension4>\r <editable>false</editable>\r <additive>true</additive>\r <sqlQuery>SELECT wo.amount_without_tax/((EXTRACT(epoch FROM (wo.end_date - wo.start_date))/86400)) as mrr_value, wo.offer_code as offer_code,ba.code as ba_code,ca.code as ca_code,cust.code as cust_code FROM billing_wallet_operation wo LEFT JOIN crm_provider p ON p.id=wo.provider_id LEFT JOIN billing_charge_instance ci ON ci.id=wo.charge_instance_id LEFT JOIN billing_subscription sub ON sub.id = ci.subscription_id LEFT JOIN billing_wallet w ON w.id=wo.wallet_id LEFT JOIN billing_user_account uaa ON uaa.id= w.user_account_id LEFT JOIN account_entity ua ON ua.id= uaa.id LEFT JOIN billing_billing_account baa ON baa.id= uaa.billing_account_id LEFT JOIN account_entity ba ON ba.id= baa.id LEFT JOIN ar_customer_account caa ON caa.id= baa.customer_account_id LEFT JOIN account_entity ca ON ca.id= caa.id LEFT JOIN crm_customer custa ON custa.id= caa.customer_id LEFT JOIN account_entity cust ON cust.id= custa.id WHERE wo.disabled=FALSE AND wo.provider_id=#{provider} AND NOT(wo.end_date IS NULL) AND ((EXTRACT(epoch FROM (wo.end_date - wo.start_date))/86400))>0 AND (wo.start_date <= '#{date}') AND (wo.end_date > '#{date}')</sqlQuery>\r <measurementPeriod>DAILY</measurementPeriod>\r <lastMeasureDate>2016-02-21T20:00:00-03:00</lastMeasureDate>\r </measurableQuantity>\r <width>1400px</width>\r <height>100px</height>\r <style>width:1000px</style>\r <visible>true</visible>\r <barPadding>8</barPadding>\r <barMargin>10</barMargin>\r <stacked>false</stacked>\r <breakOnNull>false</breakOnNull>\r <xaxisLabel>Date</xaxisLabel>\r <yaxisLabel>Monthly Rec. Revenue</yaxisLabel>\r <xaxisAngle>30</xaxisAngle>\r <legendCols>0</legendCols>\r <legendRows>0</legendRows>\r <zoom>true</zoom>\r <animate>false</animate>\r <showDataTip>true</showDataTip>\r </barChart>\r </moduleItems>\r </subModule>\r <measurableQuantity code="${#Project#entityPrefix}_${#TestSuite#index}_Measure1">\r <dimension1>first</dimension1>\r <dimension2>second</dimension2>\r <editable>false</editable>\r <additive>false</additive>\r <sqlQuery>select now from dual</sqlQuery>\r </measurableQuantity>\r </moduleItems>\r </module>\r </ws:create>\r </soapenv:Body>\r </soapenv:Envelope>

wo.start_date))/86400)) as mrr_value, wo.offer_code as offer_code,ba.code as ba_code,ca.code as ca_code,cust.code as cust_code FROM billing_wallet_operation wo LEFT JOIN crm_provider p ON p.id=wo.provider_id LEFT JOIN billing_charge_instance ci ON ci.id=wo.charge_instance_id LEFT JOIN billing_subscription sub ON sub.id = ci.subscription_id LEFT JOIN billing_wallet w ON w.id=wo.wallet_id LEFT JOIN billing_user_account uaa ON uaa.id= w.user_account_id LEFT JOIN account_entity ua ON ua.id= uaa.id LEFT JOIN billing_billing_account baa ON baa.id= uaa.billing_account_id LEFT JOIN account_entity ba ON ba.id= baa.id LEFT JOIN ar_customer_account caa ON caa.id= baa.customer_account_id LEFT JOIN account_entity ca ON ca.id= caa.id LEFT JOIN crm_customer custa ON custa.id= caa.customer_id LEFT JOIN account_entity cust ON cust.id= custa.id WHERE wo.disabled=FALSE AND wo.provider_id=#{provider} AND NOT(wo.end_date IS NULL) AND ((EXTRACT(epoch FROM (wo.end_date - wo.start_date))/86400))>0 AND (wo.start_date <= '#{date}') AND (wo.end_date > '#{date}')</sqlQuery> <measurementPeriod>DAILY</measurementPeriod> <lastMeasureDate>2016-02-21T20:00:00-03:00</lastMeasureDate> </measurableQuantity> <width>1400px</width> <height>100px</height> <style>width:1000px</style> <visible>true</visible> <barPadding>8</barPadding> <barMargin>10</barMargin> <stacked>false</stacked> <breakOnNull>false</breakOnNull> <xaxisLabel>Date</xaxisLabel> <yaxisLabel>Monthly Rec. con:testSuite.name: Sub creation, Service Activation, Charging and invoicing

con:testStep.name: Approve Billing Run
con:testStep.con:description: 1. Open the Meveo Admin page and log in. 2. Go to Invoicing->Billing runs, locate the invoice that was created then click PostInvoicing Report. 3. Scroll down the page and click Validate. 4. Go to Administration->Jobs ->Job Instances and look for Inv_Job (may have to paginate). 5. Click on Execute Job Now.

con:config.con:expectedResult: 1. An invoice_number will be generated. 2. Open pgAdmin and go to the billing_invoice table. 3. Take note of the invoice_number and paste that invoice number in the next step. 4. Select Pass on this step to proceed.

Create script
con:request.con:request:
<soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:ws="http://ws.api.meveo.org/">\r
   <soapenv:Header/>\r
   <soapenv:Body>\r
      <ws:createOrUpdate>
         	<createOrUpdateScriptInstanceRequest code="org.meveo.service.script.The${#Project#baseEntityPrefix}_ScriptEL">
            <type>JAVA</type>
            <script>
            <![CDATA[
			package org.meveo.service.script;			
			import java.util.Map;
			import java.math.BigDecimal;
			import org.meveo.admin.exception.BusinessException;
			import org.meveo.model.admin.User;
			import org.meveo.model.crm.Provider;
			import org.meveo.model.BusinessEntity;
			import org.slf4j.Logger;
			import org.slf4j.LoggerFactory;
			public class The${#Project#baseEntityPrefix}_ScriptEL extends Script {
			  	private static final Logger log = LoggerFactory.getLogger(The${#Project#baseEntityPrefix}_ScriptEL.class);
				public void execute(Map<String,Object> context, User user) throws BusinessException{
					log.debug("The${#Project#baseEntityPrefix}_ScriptEL called");
					context.put(Script.RESULT_VALUE, ((BusinessEntity)context.get(Script.CONTEXT_ENTITY)).getCode()!=null && ((BusinessEntity)context.get(Script.CONTEXT_ENTITY)).getCode().startsWith("EL_"));					
				}
			}
		   ]]>
            </script>
         </createOrUpdateScriptInstanceRequest>
      </ws:createOrUpdate>
   </soapenv:Body>\r
</soapenv:Envelope>

con:request.name: Create CFT on Charge
con:request.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:ws="http://ws.api.meveo.org/">\r <soapenv:Header/>\r <soapenv:Body>\r <ws:createOrUpdateField>\r <customField code="${#Project#baseEntityPrefix}_CFT_EL_SCRIPT" description="Field visible on entities with code starting 'EL_'">\r <fieldType>STRING</fieldType>\r <appliesTo>CHARGE</appliesTo>\r <defaultValue>KUKU</defaultValue>\r <storageType>SINGLE</storageType>\r <valueRequired>true</valueRequired>\r <applicableOnEl>#{mv:executeScript(entity,'org.meveo.service.script.The${#Project#baseEntityPrefix}_ScriptEL', null, entity.auditable.creator)}</applicableOnEl>> </customField>\r </ws:createOrUpdateField>\r </soapenv:Body>\r </soapenv:Envelope>

<soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:ws="http://ws.api.meveo.org/"> <soapenv:Header/> <soapenv:Body> <ws:createOrUpdateFilter>
